Hai Sam Company proudly offers comprehen: Hai Sam proudly provides a full range of transportation services to address all customer shipping needs. With a skilled team and a substantial fleet of transportation vehicles, Hai Sam guarantees prompt and safe delivery of your goods. We offer air, road, and sea transportation services for both domestic and international needs. Our fleet of trucks and container vehicles is equipped to handle any transportation demands, from small shipments to large-scale projects. Hai Sam is dedicated to delivering efficient, cost-effective, and time-saving transportation solutions, allowing you to focus on your core business activities with confidence.
Hai Sam Company provides professional im: Hai Sam provides expert import-export services to help businesses streamline their international trade operations. With extensive knowledge of customs procedures and regulations, we ensure prompt and precise handling of your orders. Hai Sam’s experienced and skilled team is always available to advise and support customers throughout the import-export process. We are committed to delivering effective import-export services that save time and reduce costs, boosting your competitive advantage in the global market. By choosing Hai Sam’s import-export services, customers benefit from comprehensive solutions, including consulting, customs clearance, and reliable handling of transportation and delivery.
Hai Sam Company offers professional frei: Hai Sam offers professional freight truck rental services to address all transportation needs. We maintain a varied fleet of trucks in different capacities and sizes, from small trucks to container trucks, suitable for transporting everything from small items to large goods. Our trucks are regularly serviced and equipped with advanced monitoring systems to ensure safety and efficiency throughout the transportation process. We offer flexible truck rental options, accommodating needs from local deliveries to inter-provincial and international transport. Trucks can be rented by the hour, day, or month, based on customer requirements. Our experienced drivers are well-acquainted with the routes, ensuring prompt and efficient transportation of your goods.
Hai Sam Company offers professional load: Hai Sam provides expert loading and unloading services to meet all cargo handling requirements. We use modern lifting equipment like forklifts, cranes, and other support tools to handle goods safely and efficiently, minimizing damage risks. Utilizing Hai Sam’s loading and unloading services helps customers reduce costs compared to investing in their own labor and equipment, while also optimizing operational processes.
Hai Sam provides consolidated shipping s: Hai Sam offers consolidated shipping services as a cost-effective and efficient solution for customers who need to send small quantities of goods. By combining cargo from multiple customers into a single shipment, we share transportation costs, lowering expenses for each small shipment. We provide regular and continuous consolidated shipments to provinces nationwide, catering to the need for quick and flexible transport. Hai Sam is dedicated to safeguarding your goods throughout the transportation process, using modern vehicles and experienced drivers to protect your cargo from damage.
Hai Sam provides professional, fast, and: Hai Sam delivers professional, fast, and secure delivery services to fulfill all customer cargo transportation needs. Hai Sam guarantees timely and accurate delivery to the specified location. Your goods are handled with care and transported safely using modern vehicles and experienced drivers, who adhere strictly to traffic safety regulations and protect the cargo.
Hai Sam's delivery services cater to all: Hai Sam’s delivery services cover all needs, from small parcels to large shipments and from local deliveries to distant provinces. We offer various delivery solutions, including standard, express, and super-fast delivery. Our dedicated and professional team is always available to assist customers throughout the entire process, from order reception and processing to addressing inquiries, ensuring the highest level of customer satisfaction.
As a customs broker, Hai Sam assists cus: As a customs broker, Hai Sam helps customers efficiently and swiftly manage all customs procedures. With a team of experienced experts and comprehensive knowledge of customs regulations, we provide optimal services that ensure smooth and legal clearance of goods. We promptly handle customs procedures to help customers clear their goods quickly, saving time and minimizing costs related to delays.
Hai Sam offers a comprehensive range of: Hai Sam provides a complete range of customs-related services, including customs declarations, cargo inspections, packing, cargo release at the port, and other related services, addressing all customer needs. With our thorough understanding of customs regulations and procedures, we help customers reduce legal risks and resolve any issues that may arise during the cargo clearance process.

Through dedication and hard work, we have grown into a global logistics leader, connecting businesses and markets across continents.

Hai Sam Company offers a professional en: Hai Sam Company offers a professional entrusted import service, helping customers quickly and efficiently search for and import goods from across Vietnam and neighboring countries in the region. We provide two forms of import services to meet the diverse needs of our customers:
If you already have specific images and: If you already have specific images and specifications of the products you need, simply send this information to Hai Sam. We will search for the exact products with the right specifications and prices. This method ensures that customers receive products that meet their specified requirements and standards.
For customers who do not have available: For customers who do not have available samples or specific information about the products they need to import, Hai Sam Company will assist in sourcing and finding reputable wholesalers from China. We will leverage our extensive partner network and years of experience in the import sector to find new sources, ensuring quality and competitive pricing. Customers will be provided with detailed information about potential sources, allowing them to choose the most suitable products for their business needs.
Hai Sam Company is committed to deliveri: Hai Sam Company is committed to delivering absolute customer satisfaction and trust through high-quality, fast, and transparent entrusted import services. Let us be your reliable partner in all your goods import activities.
